=== Purchase Information ===
Product Title: Miss Bala [DVD]
Review Date: 2019/06/27
Store: Gina Rodriguez  (Actor),     Ismael Córdova  (Actor),     Catherine Hardwicke  (Director)    &                   0                  more   Rated:    PG-13    Format: DVD
Categories: Movies & TV, Studio Specials, Sony Pictures Home Entertainment, All Sony Pictures Titles
Product Description: ['Gloria (Gina Rodriguez) drives to Tijuana, Mexico, to visit her best friend who is competing in the local “Miss Baja” beauty pageant. During a night out, her friend is abducted and Gloria finds herself a pawn in a dangerous game being played by the CIA, the DEA, and a charismatic yet ruthless cartel kingpin. Finding a power she never knew she had, Gloria plays one organization against the other as she seeks to rescue her friend. Surviving will require all of her cunning, inventiveness and strength. This edge-of-your-seat action thriller is being hailed as a “kick-ass origin story for a new kind of action hero” (Peter Debruge, Variety).']
Average Rating: 4.6

reference_summary:
Country Strong
Gwyneth Paltrow  (Actor),     Tim McGraw  (Actor),     Shana Feste  (Director)    &                   0                  more   Rated:    PG-13    Format: DVD
Movies & TV, Studio Specials, Sony Pictures Home Entertainment, All Sony Pictures Titles
['Product Description', 'Soon after a rising young singer-songwriter (Garrett Hedlund) gets involved with a fallen, emotionally unstable country star (Gwyneth Paltrow), the pair embark on a career resurrection tour helmed by her husband/manager (Tim McGraw) and featuring a beauty queen-turned-singer (Leighton Meester). Between concerts, romantic entanglements and old demons threaten to derail them all.', 'Amazon.com', 'A Nashville superstar faces a crossroads in her life in the sweet, sentimental', 'Country Strong', ". While in rehab, Gwyneth Paltrow's six-time Grammy Award winner Kelly Canter has a fling with an admiring orderly, Beau (", 'Tron: Legacy', "'s Garrett Hedlund). An aspiring singer/songwriter, Beau tells Kelly's manager and husband, James (Tim McGraw, Hedlund's", 'Friday Night Lights', 'father), that he\'s her "sponsor." Anxious to revitalize her career, James checks Kelly out early to send her back on tour. He may love his wife, but he doesn\'t know when to stop pushing. When he hears Beau\'s duet with former beauty queen Chiles (', 'Gossip Girl', "'s Leighton Meester), he adds them to the bill. En route from Tennessee to Texas, Beau discovers that Chiles is more talented and intelligent than he thought, but he remains devoted to his mentor, even though he knows they have no future. When Kelly starts drinking again, Beau gravitates towards his more stable tour mate. Writer-director Shana Feste (", 'The Greatest', ") doesn't argue that love and work can't coexist, but rather that love and fame are incompatible. They certainly present a challenge, but it's a shaky thesis on which to build a film, especially when McGraw and Faith Hill, one of Paltrow's musical inspirations, serve as the exception that proves the rule. Consequently, the scenario falls apart by the final act, since someone has to suffer to illustrate Feste's point. Until then, the cast rises to the occasion, particularly Meester, who brings a breezy charm to an overly pessimistic premise.", '--Kathleen C. Fennessy']
{'Genre': 'Music, Drama, Romance', 'Format': 'Multiple Formats, AC-3, Closed-captioned, Color, Dolby, Dubbed, NTSC, Subtitled, Widescreen', 'Contributor': 'Tim McGraw, Shana Feste, Gwyneth Paltrow', 'Language': 'English', 'Runtime': '1 hour and 57 minutes', 'Aspect Ratio': '2.40:1', 'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'MPAA rating': 'PG-13 (Parents Strongly Cautioned)', 'Product Dimensions': '0.6 x 5.3 x 7.5 inches; 2.4 Ounces', 'Item model number': 'CTR37446DVD', 'Director': 'Shana Feste', 'Media Format': 'Multiple Formats, AC-3, Closed-captioned, Color, Dolby, Dubbed, NTSC, Subtitled, Widescreen', 'Run time': '1 hour and 57 minutes', 'Release date': 'April 12, 2011', 'Actors': 'Gwyneth Paltrow, Tim McGraw', 'Dubbed': 'French', 'Subtitles': 'French, English, Spanish', 'Studio': 'Sony', 'Country of Origin': 'USA', 'Number of discs': '1'}

profile:
**User Profile Summary:**

- **Genre Preference:** The user enjoys a blend of Music, Drama, and Romance genres; they are open to action thrillers that incorporate emotional depth and personal relationships, as demonstrated by their recent purchase.

- **Tone:** They are drawn to narratives that explore emotional complexity, particularly those that feature career struggles and romantic entanglements, showcasing a willingness to engage with diverse storylines.

- **Review Behavior:** The user consistently provides positive feedback, reflecting their appreciation for quality storytelling and character development. Their recent enthusiastic rating suggests continued satisfaction with their film choices.

- **Medium Engagement:** They maintain a preference for movies on DVD format, emphasizing a fondness for physical collections over digital, despite exploring other genres.

- **Target Audience Awareness:** The user resonates with well-known actors and directors, indicating a preference for established talent and substantial production value, as seen in their recent selections.

- **Content Evaluation:** They value films with strong character arcs and engaging emotional storytelling. Their feedback highlights an enjoyment of narratives that combine action with personal stakes, reinforcing their interest in dynamic character journeys.

Overall, this user demonstrates a growing affinity for emotionally rich, character-driven films, integrating elements of action and thriller alongside their love for romance and drama, while aligning their viewing preferences with impactful performances and compelling plots.
